name: Standstill (Arĥimedeς ℳontegasppα)
description:
Standstill is a Plants-vs-Zombies-style game: you have to protect the tree by sending protective creatures (bluish outline) to intercept the invading creatures (dark grey outline).

  • LMB to send a creature
  • RMB to recall the creature
  • Escape to quit to menu
  • In the menu, press Enter to start the game
  • In the menu, press Escape to quit

Game developed in Godot 3.4.4. The creatures were designed in Kenney’s Creature Mixer, the sounds were initially downloaded from Freesound, and then edited to better suit the game.

If this game raises enough money, I’m planning to expand it with more levels and maybe more creatures.

Versions for macOS and Android to come!
